job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkeling van AI-modellen: ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of designing, developing, and implementing predictive models and algorithms, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
job_tasks.justification: This lists specific types of machine learning problems (computer vision, regression, classification, NLP) that are part of model development and traditional ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Experimenten en Proof-of-Concepts: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the research and experimental phase of model development, focusing on proving feasibility and comparing models.

job_tasks.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Cross-functionele samenwerking' and 'werk samen met diverse afdelingen' explicitly indicate collaboration with different departments.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to knowledge sharing and presenting findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.

job_tasks.phrase: Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.
job_tasks.justification: The instruction to 'Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends' signifies a requirement for continuous learning and staying current with advancements.

job_tasks.phrase: deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.
job_tasks.justification: This part of the sentence refers to sharing knowledge within the company, which is a form of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen
Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI
deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes tasks related to developing and implementing traditional machine learning models (predictive models, computer vision, regression, classification, NLP) and conducting experiments. These tasks fall predominantly under Macro-Category B. There are no tasks described that belong to Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering). The role also involves significant collaboration and knowledge sharing. This aligns with the definition of an 'ML Specialist (Data Scientist)' profile, which is characterized by a focus on traditional ML tasks within Macro-Category B, without a strong emphasis on software engineering integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear about the technical focus on traditional ML tasks and the soft skills required. However, it lacks any mention of specific technologies or tools, which would have provided further context. The absence of any software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A) makes the classification straightforward.
